title: New Yorkers Equally Dim on Trump, De Blasio, Poll Shows
text:
In their home state, New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio is just as unpopular as President Trump, according to a poll released Tuesday.

Mr. de Blasio, a Democrat who is running for president and frequently criticizes Mr. Trump, was viewed favorably by 25% of the 798 New York voters surveyed last week by the Siena College Research Institute. Fifty-seven percent of respondents around the state had an unfavorable view of Mr. de Blasio. In the five boroughs, 33% of voters viewed Mr. de Blasio favorably compared with 58% who viewed...
description: In their home state, New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio is just as unpopular as President Trump, according to a poll released Tuesday.
